plot: Aadi meets a mysterious and concealing traveler George Koshy Anthrapper and travels with him from Kochi to Madurai. On their way, they come across Sunny and Kani who change their lives.
title: Pakida
plot_es: Aadi meets a mysterious and concealing traveler George Koshy Anthrapper and travels with him from Kochi to Madurai. On their way, they come across Sunny and Kani who change their lives.
plot_en: Aadi meets a mysterious and concealing traveler George Koshy Anthrapper and travels with him from Kochi to Madurai. On their way, they come across Sunny and Kani who change their lives.
